title: Booting 32bit Windows in a 64bit UEFI System

forumNotes.author: sb1370
forumNotes.content:
Hi;

I need to boot 32bit Windows in my laptop which is 64bit. I have tried some ways also searched internet but no success. e.g. Tried chainloading 32bit Windows UEFI boot manager from Clover and Grub, Tried 64bit Windows UEFI bootmanager to boot 32bit Windows (gives invalid signature error for ntoskrnl.exe), tried rEFInd to boot MBR (said CSM isn't supported by my mobo or is disabled) .

Is there any solution for this?

Thanks
